explanation: [0-0] The video is divided into upper and lower parts. The upper part is a live-action performance, and the lower part is an animated image. The upper part is on a street, with houses and trees in the back. On the left is a man wearing a striped T-shirt and blue jeans, his face with a red devil mask digitally added, holding a shovel in his right hand. On the right is a woman in a green and white patchwork jacket and black pants, her face digitally replaced with an image of Jesus, squatting and fiddling with something on the ground. The lower part shows Jesus and the devil arm-wrestling, Jesus full of strength and the devil grimacing.

[0-5] The man with the devil mask in the upper part bends over, places the wooden handle of the shovel on the ground under the body of the woman with the Jesus image, and then gets up, faces left, and jumps twice. The woman takes a step to the right, after which the man jumps onto the shovel. The upright wooden handle hits the man's back and breaks. The man touches his back and falls to the ground, and the woman stands up and turns to face him. Then, the picture switches to a new scene. The background of the upper part becomes a mountain with a flight of stairs at the foot of it. Jesus, dressed in a white robe, stands at the bottom of the stairs, smiling, with his arms raised above his head and thumbs up. There is a wooden sign beside him that says "LIKE & SUBSCRIBE" with a rectangular red logo. The devil, wearing gray pants, kneels on the ground, hands on the ground, with a dejected expression. The lower part still shows Jesus and the devil arm-wrestling.
